messages.title: LESS TAX FOR LOW EARNERS AND FAIRER PENSIONS
messages.content: Under the Labour government, millions of people on low incomes are forced to pay every month. Ajmal wants to radically re-balance the tax system, cutting taxes for people who work hard and not earn much. That includes abolishing the council tax as it is optional.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ajmal Masroor aims to cut taxes for low earners by taking the first Â£10,000 of income out of taxes entirely and making the wealthy pay a fair share. He also plans to make pensions fairer by restoring the link between earnings and pensions.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat Labour

issues.economy: Cutting taxes for low earners and fairer pensions.

images.caption: The Lib Dem Shadow Chancellor Dr Vince Cable MP declares his support for Ajmal Masroor with local campaigner Ajmal Masroor.

leaflet.additionalNotes: ELECTION ROUNDUP - Bethnal Green and Bow Constituency results from last general election: Labour 1st, Lib Dem 2nd, Con 3rd, Respect 4th. Tactical voting might be an issue as the leaflet suggests 'Only the Lib Dems can beat Labour'.
